name: React Testing Library
description: The React Testing Library is a set of utilities that help you test React components in a way that resembles how users interact with your application. It focuses on testing user behavior rather than implementation details.
benefits: Tests are more robust to refactoring of internal component logic
Provides utilities to query the DOM like a user would
usage_notes: Often used in conjunction with Jest.
Avoids testing internal state or component methods directly.
